channel.title: Comments on: Diabolical Genius, or I Love Interrogation
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:

You always give good comment! :D Those hands! [shiver]

item.title: By: ScrewLooseHoney
item.dc:creator: ScrewLooseHoney
item.description: Gotta love being in the hands (so to speak) of a genius. Molded you like putty, eh? ;) Enjoyed the story
item.content:encoded: Gotta love being in the hands (so to speak) of a genius. Molded you like putty, eh? ;) Enjoyed the story

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/diabolical-genius/#comment-229">Cava Supernova</a>.
Thank you! I have four of those adorable gingerbread men pics, so now of course I'm obligated to write four posts on this topic, right? :p
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Cava Supernova.

Thank you! I have four of those adorable gingerbread men pics, so now of course I’m obligated to write four posts on this topic, right? :p

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/diabolical-genius/#comment-228">Cava Supernova</a>.
LOL! I aced it? That's a funny way to describe being reduced to a trembling mess in ten minutes flat, but it certainly feels great to know I was, er, enjoyed. :) And especially that my sexual hangups enhanced rather than impeded the entertainment!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Cava Supernova.

LOL! I aced it? That’s a funny way to describe being reduced to a trembling mess in ten minutes flat, but it certainly feels great to know I was, er, enjoyed. :) And especially that my sexual hangups enhanced rather than impeded the entertainment!

item.title: By: Cava Supernova
item.dc:creator: Cava Supernova
item.description: Oh, awesome pic choice too - that gingerbread sadist is terrifying!
item.content:encoded: Oh, awesome pic choice too – that gingerbread sadist is terrifying!

item.title: By: Cava Supernova
item.dc:creator: Cava Supernova
item.description: I love this post, I was feeling some serious terror myself and it didn't even happen to me. I think you're so brave, you must feel great having aced it too! Kudos :) xxxx
item.content:encoded: I love this post, I was feeling some serious terror myself and it didn’t even happen to me. I think you’re so brave, you must feel great having aced it too! Kudos :) xxxx

item.title: By: john
item.dc:creator: john
item.description:
Sounds like a great experience; the mind is incredibly powerful and my wife loves to use mine against me.
The demo is something I'd love to see! ;-)
item.content:encoded:
Sounds like a great experience; the mind is incredibly powerful and my wife loves to use mine against me.

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/diabolical-genius/#comment-166">dianekepler</a>.
Oh dear, sorry to disappoint! I didn't leave out much, and certainly nothing important. Since writing this post I have realised that I experienced it much more as a humiliation scene than as an interrogation scene. But if you would like to fill in the blanks, please just imagine a lot more questions along the same lines. Like the exact nature of my boyfriend's erection.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to dianekepler.

Oh dear, sorry to disappoint! I didn’t leave out much, and certainly nothing important. Since writing this post I have realised that I experienced it much more as a humiliation scene than as an interrogation scene. But if you would like to fill in the blanks, please just imagine a lot more questions along the same lines. Like the exact nature of my boyfriend’s erection.

item.title: By: dianekepler
item.dc:creator: dianekepler
item.description: I wish you'd gone into more detail about exactly what went on. Still, an interesting read.
item.content:encoded: I wish you’d gone into more detail about exactly what went on. Still, an interesting read.

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/diabolical-genius/#comment-162">Eric Pride</a>.
Thank you! It was very tempting to censor all the irrational parts. But I guess I'm glad I didn't. :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eric Pride.

Thank you! It was very tempting to censor all the irrational parts. But I guess I’m glad I didn’t. :)

item.title: By: Eric Pride
item.dc:creator: Eric Pride
item.description:
Thank you for sharing your experience from the demo!
It's really interesting for me to read what went on inside your mind all throughout. A great writing
